descricao: Expected Impact:This call for proposals will select one single project which will regrant a minimum of 25 projects from all performing arts sub-sectors and disciplines.The selected project should observe, and analyse the results of the projects which have been selected for granting and publish analysis reports which should include topics such as artistsâ€™ working conditions and fair remuneration, sustainable touring routes, inclusion, skills, employment, professions, artistic creation, youth, etc
